mapper.select: SELECT * FROM review WHERE member_num = #{member_num} AND review_item_type = #{review_item_type} AND review_item_num = #{review_item_num}
mapper.insert: INSERT review (member_num, review_item_type, review_item_num, review_content, review_score) VALUES (#{member_num}, #{review_item_type}, #{review_item_num}, #{review_content}, #{review_score})
mapper.update: UPDATE review SET review_content = #{review_content} WHERE review_num = #{review_num}
